name: A&W MAINTENANCE AND COATINGS, LLC
description: A&W Maintenance and Coatings LLC is master applicator of epoxy coatings.
sampleDescriptions: Providing aging infrastructure repair assistance for projects and facilities related to water delivery and flood control that are owned, operated, and maintained by the Federal government.
Assist in communications with relevant agencies, authorizing committees, and delegation regarding high hazard dam program and other infrastructure measures to address dams in need of repair.
Track and report on the implementation of the Water Resources Development Act of 2020.
